{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=RTA2200T |price=179.99 |fcc_date=01/11/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=new |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=ZTT-RTA2200T |ic_id=10233A-RTA2200T |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, 610HT,1610 MY;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, SON |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_Helios_2.4, Amped_Helios_5.0 |default_ip=192.168.3.1 }}
:• 2x '''867'''Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''400'''Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|HELIOS High Power AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/rta2200t.html}} The product page claims 128MB of RAM but FCC docs show a 256MB chip. ===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10978/amped-wireless-launches-ac2200-helios-family-with-qualcomms-triradio-80211ac-solution ''Amped Wireless Launches AC2200 HELIOS Family with Qualcomm's
Tri-Radio 802.11ac Solution'' on '''AnandTech'''] :AC2200: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ40x9 + QCA9886 :AC3000: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ40x9 + QCA9984 ===See also=== * [[Amped Wireless RE2200T]] - ''High Power AC2200 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ZTT-RE2200T ZTT-RE2200T]
